genetic.framework.core

Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • genetic.framework.core.Population

  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    Framework class for the population. A collection of individuals that can evolve.
    Author:
    Ignacio Cuevas

    • Field Detail

      • individuals

        private java.util.ArrayList<Individual> individuals
        Members of the population.

      • tournamentSize

        private int tournamentSize
        Tournament size. Default value is 5, but can be modified using setTournamentSize().

      • problem

        private Problem problem
        Object representing the current problem

      • solution

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> solution
        Solution for the current problem. Expressed as an ArrayList of integers, since it's a collection of genes. Computed when the Population object is created.

      • factory

        private IndividualFactory factory
        Individual factory. Responsible for the creation of the population members.

      • elitismOffset

        private int elitismOffset
        Elitism offset. Used to decide how many of the best individuals of a certain generation pass directly to the next. Defaults to 0, but can be modified using setElitism();

    • Constructor Detail

      • Population

        public Population(IndividualFactory individualFactory,
                  Problem problem)
        Public constructor. Sets the Individual factory.
        Parameters:
        individualFactory - An instance from a class
        problem - Problem model for the algorithm. that implements IndividualFactory. Used to create the population's individuals.

    • Method Detail

      • setElitism

        public void setElitism(int newOffset)
        Elitism offset setter.
        Parameters:
        newOffset - Desired elitismOffset.

      • numberOfIndividuals

        public int numberOfIndividuals()
        Gets the number of individuals based on the size of the population attribute.
        Returns:
        Number of individuals in the population.

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Sets the solution of the population. Delegates the responsibility of computing it to the Problem object.

      • setTournamentSize

        public void setTournamentSize(int newSize)
        Tournament size setter. Used to modify the default value if required.
        Parameters:
        newSize - Desired size for the tournament.

      • sortByFitness

        public void sortByFitness()
        Sorts the population according to the fitness of its individuals. Fittest individuals are placed at the top. This is used to get the fittest individuals in an easier way.

      • getFittest

        public java.util.ArrayList<Individual> getFittest(int n)
        Gets the n fittest individuals of the population.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of individuals requested.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing the n fittest individuals of the population.

      • generatePopulation

        public void generatePopulation(int size)
        Generates a new set of individuals for the population. Each of the individuals has their genes set.
        Parameters:
        size - Size of the population to be generated.

      • evolve

        public Population evolve()
        Creates a new population that has evolved from the current one and should be more fit to solve the problem.
        Returns:
        A new population generated according to the defined rules.

      • tournamentSelection

        private Individual tournamentSelection()
        Picks some random individuals from the population, and takes the fittest.
        Returns:
        The fittest individual from the subset of the population.

      • fittestIndividual

        public Individual fittestIndividual()
        Gets the fittest individual of the population.
        Returns:
        The fittest individual of this population.

      • beginSimulation

        public static Population beginSimulation(Population population,
                                         int populationSize,
                                         int loopCount)
        Static method that begins the population simulation.
        Parameters:
        population - Initial population for the simulation.
        populationSize - Size for all the generations of population.
        loopCount - Number of evolution iterations.
        Returns:
        The final population, i.e. the result of evolving (through natural selection, crossover and mutation) the initial population.
